knimeNode.name: Database Column Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Database Column Filter allows columns to be excluded from the input table database table.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows columns to be filtered from the input database table while the SQL result will only contain the remaining columns. Within the dialog, columns can be moved between the Include and Exclude list.
fullDescription.option: This list contains the column names that are included.
Use these buttons to move columns between the Include and Exclude list.

Use one of these fields to search either within the Include or Exclude list for certain column names or name substrings. Repeated clicking of the search button marks the next column that matches the search text. The check box 'Mark all search hits' causes all matching columns to be selected making them movable between the two lists.
This list contains the column names of the input table that are excluded.

ports.inPort: Table in database with columns to exclude
ports.outPort: Table in the database with excluded columns
